      • DateFromUI

        public static java.util.Date DateFromUI(java.util.Date date,
                                        java.lang.Integer hours,
                                        java.lang.Integer mins,
                                        java.lang.Integer seconds)
        Converts user's input to Date instance.
        Parameters:
        date - - input race date.
        hours - - input result hours for horse.
        mins - - input result minutes for horse.
        seconds- - input result seconds for horse.
        Returns:
        appropriate Date instance if converting was successful, and null if not.
